comment: I REALLY TOOK HER FOR ENG 1102 BUT ITS NOT LISTED. CLASS WAS VERY EASY. ONLY 2-3 PAPERS FOR THE SEMESTER AN SHE ISN'T A TOUGH GRADER. WE HAD A COUPLE ASSIGNMENTS THROUGHOUT THE WEEKS THAT WE HAD TO USE AN ONLINE TEXTBOOK FOR (THAT YOU HAVE TO PURCHASE). SHE DOES LOWKEY TAKE A MINUTE TO GRADE AND EMAIL BACK BUT SHE ACCEPTS LATE WORK SO IG ITS FINE.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Hamilton is such an amazing teacher and very understanding to students if they dont understand the material. She's very chill about somethings of what you want to write in your final essay. 100% would reccomned her class for students.

I had Professor Hamilton for ENGL 1102 and she was super sweet! The class is very straightforward with weekly modules to help build your final essay which you're working on throughout the semester. She would always reply to emails quickly and always happy to help. I definitely recommend!

An amazing professor overall! Everything was pretty clear for what she wanted out of the assignments, and the assignments were meant to gather information for the final projects as well as essays to make them easier for you. She does grade slow, but it didn't bother me as most professors grade slowly. Take her if you can!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: I had her for 1101 and 1102, she was really sweet and gave at most like 5 pretty simple assignments. the textbook could be found online and you only need it about one time the entire semester. there is a weekly discussion post for a participation grade, i believe. no mandatory attendance.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: We had 3 major essays over the semester, 1 weekly activity, and reading. I rented the textbook instead of buying from ksu bookstore. Professor Hamilton didn't realize we couldn't see our grades for half the semester but she released them and made an apology announcement. Very nice and class was not hard as long as you do your work!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Her course schedule and D2L was laid out so confusing, slow grader and that gives you no time at the end of semester to improve ur grade, she didn't respond to some emails, makes you buy the textbook just to do like 1-2 activities in it and the rest is pointless weekly readings that I didn't even do. Other than that, class is pretty easy
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Great Teacher, she cares more that you try than anything. Grading isn't harsh and gives great feedback

Great professor! Shes super kind and cares about the students. There are a few papers and some discussion posts but the work load is super light and really easy if you come to class. Highly Reccomend. Also course is hybrid, so theres just an assignment over the weekend ussually a discussion post.
Took her class and I could say I definitely recommend her class. If you pay attention to what she is saying you will pass. She will go over the material a lot as well and gives you a lot of time
Would take this professor again. Her class is easy and I passed it
Only 3 major papers, there is an assignment each week but they aren't too bad. Everything is laid out clearly online but she doesn't answer emails quickly if you have any questions.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: all of the work is fairly easy, not a lot of assignments usually 1 per week, and are usually used to interact with the class, she will give good feedback on work or will help you if you are lost.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Very easy class. If you do the work, you'll get a good grade. She's very accessible by email, and not afraid to extend due dates/admit when she messes up. There's a lot of writing (obviously) but the topics are fairly open ended. All assignments have clearly laid out instructions. Overall, easy class with a kind teacher.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Loved this class and this Professor. Only 3 essays which she gave us plenty of time for.
rating_tags: Caring--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: I had professor Hamilton for Eng. 1102 and I loved taking her class. It was super easy, straight forward, and didn't have mandatory attendance. A text book isn't really needed for me because I only used mine twice and if you sign up first date of discussions its not needed at all.
Highly recommend. I am someone who has always struggled with English classes and have never been above a C in them, so me being at a 100 in the class should tell you all you need to know.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Really enjoyed this class and would definitely recommend this professor. This class is an easy 100, you don't really have to show up to class but would definitely recommend it. She is very nice, caring, and understandable. You can also get around the readings.
Very good, take her class!

100% take this class. 3 essays take the majority of your grade and she walks you through what you need to do to get a 100. She is very open to questions and does not create busy work. Attendance grade is only if there was an in class assignment, which are all easy. TAKE THIS CLASS!!

One of the best teachers Ive ever had. She genuinely has student success in mind and it shows. Essays and assignments are straightforward. She also gave us exactly what we needed to learn straightforward and effectively, no pointless busy work or assignments that dont make sense and add even more stress to our college lives. 10/10 would recommend

I highly recommend taking this professor! She made the assignments very clear and was willing to help at any time. She also made the class enjoyable to be in rather than just doing boring assignments. I wasn't ever worried that I wouldn't do well in this class, so take it if you can!
